snippet: Chicago defensive tackle Ego Ferguson was suspended for four games after the backup offensive tackle Tayo Fabuluje was lost for the same number of games two days earlier.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Chicago Bears defensive tackle Ego Ferguson is suspended for four games after testing positive for performance-enhancing drugs; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago defensive tackle Ego Ferguson was suspended for four games after the backup offensive tackle Tayo Fabuluje was lost for the same number of games two days earlier.

headline.print_headline: Bears Lose 2nd Player Who Failed Drug Test
headline.main: Bears Lose 2nd Player Who Failed Drug Test
